## Domain Pack Checklist

If adding/modifying a domain pack:

- [ ] `pack.yaml` is valid
- [ ] `schema.json` is valid JSON Schema
- [ ] Eval cases added/updated
- [ ] All fixtures use synthetic/redacted data
- [ ] Smoke eval passes: `python -m evals.runner.smoke_eval --pack <pack-name>`
- [ ] README updated

## SDK Checklist

If modifying an SDK:

- [ ] Type definitions updated
- [ ] Tests added/updated
- [ ] README updated
- [ ] No breaking changes (or documented in changelog)
